title: UK government forced into climbdown on inheritance tax for farmers
description: Ministers raise the assets threshold at which the levy will be payable to £2.5mn after backlash from rural areas
content: Ministers raise the assets threshold at which the levy will be payable to £2.5mn after backlash from rural areas
